snippet.title: Bootleg Gaming : Roge Brer [Mario Bros. Hack by Inventor]
snippet.description:
A Chinese company called 'Inventor' flooded the bootleg games market with multiple multicarts in the 2000s, and are reportedly responsible for a large part of the deluge of terrible games on these bootleg systems.

Roge Brer is a pointless Mario Bros. re-sprite with a very strange name. It's also known as 'Rouge Brothers' in some ROMs, and sprites are pretty terrible.

=============
For more unusual, lost, obscure, and forgotten media, please check out http://www.mindlessshelfindulgence.com
